casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Forbes, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Forbes, 114 Ohio St.3d 40, 2007-Ohio-2714.]

(No. 2006-2294 Submitted May 23, 2007 Decided June 20, 2007.)

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Wilson, 113 Ohio St.3d 382, 2007-Ohio-2202, 865 N.E.2d 1264

Moyer, C.J., Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger and Cupp, JJ., concur. *41William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Mary H. McGrath, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. David L. Doughten, for appellant.
